column1: Please support our NHS heroes share &amp

Great Corona Virus talk by Rob Cywes @ObesityResolved More or less saying the same as @DrAseemMalhotra and @FatEmperor ... a little more direct perhaps May be ‘censored’ by the thought police before long, so watch it while you can ....
North Wales now has more coronavirus cases than any other part of the country
Lockdown rules change slightly on MONDAY yet it seems every man and his dog are acting as if the government have just said coronavirus doesn’t exist
